channel.title: Faqs on Pony
channel.description: Recent content in Faqs on Pony

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Compiling I get a “requires dynamic” error when compiling, how do I solve it? /usr/bin/ld.gold: error: ./fb.o: requires dynamic R_X86_64_32 reloc against 'Array_String_val_Trace' which may overflow at runtime; recompile with -fPIC try running ponyc with the --pic flag. For example: ponyc --pic examples/helloworld
